reviewText:
The routine in this video is perfect. It covers flexibility, balance and strength. There are two girls both of which are nice to look at. One does the basic move and the other does the intermediate level of the move. I thought this was very helpful to allow one to adjust to their own skill level. The nudity is not distracting, arousing, or strange. I thought it might be one or more of the three but the yoga practice is so great that the nudity is hardly noticeable.
Another great thing about this video is the length of the practice is less than an hour, which is nice.
I really like this! It was weird at first but i thoroughly enjoy it. It's my me time! I would recommend it to a friend.

The model was excellent, the technical quality was excellent.  The poses were very good, nudity could've been somewhat more generous and more closeup and intimate poses would've been good.  Overall, a five star rating, a welcome addition to any collection.
This is an extremely advanced practice - I usually do intermediate to advanced classes and this one left me in the dust. But it was very high quality.
Very nice and well done informational narrated well and the model does a fantastic job of going through each exercise in a manner that's easy to follow.
Very hairy female.  Hard to watch.

I really enjoyed this video. I love yoga. The two ladies are very sexy. I plan to watch this video a lot more. I may even do yoga with the nice ladies. They appear to enjoy doing yoga in the buff very much.
Dummy me, Naked means there are naked yoga people... yet it is still good instructions.
My wife isn't a yoga person but she liked this routine because it was not to difficult.
